text: Nicholas George Littlemore (born 6 May 1978) is an Australian musician and record producer. He is known as a member of the musical trio Pnau (with Peter Mayes and Sam Littlemore) and duo Empire of the Sun (with Luke Steele). He was also a member of the band Teenager with New Zealand-born Pip Brown. He was born in Sydney, New South Wales. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Australian pop musicians Category:Australian rock musicians Category:Electronic musicians Category:Musicians from Sydney Category:Australian record producers
title: Nick Littlemore
